paà·Šrajathanthaà·Šrawadaye agaya dakima owun eka digatama paà·Šrathikshepa karanne nam, owunge namayan paà·Šrajathanthaà·Šrawadaye muradewathawun washayen liyawena ekak natha. 1978 wyawasthawa athi kara ganna awasthawedi, ee magin rate paà·Šrajathanthaà·Šrawadayata athi wiya haki awadanama gana boho adahas udahas palawuni.
me pradeshayanta aawenika pan aashià·Šratha karmantha shala aarambha karawima sandaha me puhunu wada satahana aarambha kerini.

mewara maha kannaya hektayar laksha 08k waga kara athi athara yuriya bhawithaya pilibandawa da sabhapathiwaraya pahadili kaleya.ee anuwa wadima yuriya bhawithayak aththe piliwelin anuradhapura disthrikkaya me.to.27,000k da, ampara yuriya me.to.22,000k da,kurunagala me.to.21,000 da, polonnaruwa me.to. 19,500 da, madakalapuwa 14,000k da washayen lak pohora samagama mangin pohora gowin wetha laba di athi bawa pawasiya.
